name: Simple Shopping
description:
A physics based game where shopping isn't as simple as you may think.

Control a wacky character, while putting items in your cart. Don't let this mundane task fool you, it may be something you didn't quite sign up for. 

This game was a submission for the VGDC Winter Game Jam 2021. The theme was "I didn't sign up for this".

Made by only 2 people, our interpretation of the theme was to take a very simple task and make it difficult. With a name like "Simple Shopping", this would give the players a product they didn't necessarily sign up for.
